items.name: The Forgotten
items.instructions:
## Goal
- Unlock **The Forgotten**.

## Requirements
- Access to Boss Rush (needs Mom killed fast enough).
- Survive while being chased by stomps after starting the quest.

## Step-by-step from a fresh run
- On Floor 1, beat the boss in under 1 minute.
- Return to the starting room and bomb the centre to reveal the shovel piece.
- Pick up the quest item (you’ll be chased by stomps).
- Reach and complete Boss Rush while carrying it.
- Finish the sequence in the Dark Room to unlock **The Forgotten**.

## Tips
- Bring mobility and defensive items. The stomps do not negotiate.

items.name: The Lost
items.instructions:
## Goal
- Unlock **The Lost**.

## Requirement
- You need **Missing Poster**.

## Step-by-step from a fresh run
- Get **Missing Poster**.
- Find a Sacrifice Room.
- Die on the spikes while holding Missing Poster.
- You unlock **The Lost**.

items.name: Mom
items.instructions: From a fresh run: reach Depths II and beat Mom (requires defeating Mom once to unlock Womb progression in general).

items.name: Mom's Heart
items.instructions: From a fresh run: reach Womb II and beat Mom’s Heart.

items.name: It Lives!
items.instructions: From a fresh run: after enough Mom’s Heart kills, Mom’s Heart is replaced by It Lives! on Womb II.

items.name: Satan
items.instructions: From a fresh run: after Mom’s Heart/It Lives!, take the Devil Room trapdoor to Sheol and beat Satan.

items.name: Isaac (Boss)
items.instructions: From a fresh run: after Mom’s Heart/It Lives!, take the Angel Room beam to Cathedral and beat Isaac.

items.name: The Lamb
items.instructions: From a fresh run: beat Satan to unlock The Dark Room; The Lamb is the boss at the end of The Dark Room.

items.name: ??? (Boss)
items.instructions: From a fresh run: beat Isaac to unlock The Chest; ??? is the boss at the end of The Chest.

items.name: Mega Satan
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Optional end boss behind the golden door.

## Requirements
- [[Key Pieces (Mega Satan)]] x2 from Angel Rooms.

## Step-by-step
- Prioritise [[Angel Rooms]] (skip early Devil Deals).
- Get both key pieces by defeating the angels from bombed statues.
- Use the key pieces to open the door and fight Mega Satan.

items.name: Ultra Greed
items.instructions: From a fresh run: play Greed Mode and reach the final floor to fight Ultra Greed.

items.name: Ultra Greedier
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Final boss of Greedier Mode.

## Step-by-step
- Play Greedier Mode and clear waves through floors.
- Reach the final floor and defeat Ultra Greedier.

items.name: Hush
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Timed boss in the Blue Womb.

## How to reach it
- Beat Mom's Heart/It Lives fast enough for the blue door to appear.

## Step-by-step
- Reach Mom's Heart/It Lives.
- Beat it quickly.
- Enter the [[Blue Door (Hush)]].
- Defeat Hush.

items.name: Delirium
items.instructions:
## What it is
- End boss in The Void.

## Step-by-step (reliable)
- Defeat [[Hush]].
- If a Void portal appears, enter it.
- Navigate the Void and defeat Delirium.

items.name: Mother
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Major end-route boss reached via the Repentance alt path.

## Requirements
- Access [[Downpour]], [[Mines]], [[Mausoleum]], and [[Corpse]].
- Obtain [[Knife Piece 1]] and [[Knife Piece 2]] to form [[Assembled Knife]].

## Step-by-step (full route)
- Basement 1: alt door (1 key) → [[Downpour]].
- Downpour/Dross 2: use [[Mirror World]] → [[Knife Piece 1]].
- Caves 1: alt door (2 keys) → [[Mines]].
- Mines/Ashpit 2: chase sequence → [[Knife Piece 2]].
- Depths 1: alt door (2 hearts) → [[Mausoleum]].
- Mausoleum/Gehenna 2: flesh door + [[Assembled Knife]] → [[Corpse]].
- Corpse: defeat **Mother**.

items.name: Dogma
items.instructions:
## Goal
- Beat **Dogma** on the Beast route.

## Requirements
- Start [[Ascent & Dad's Note]].
- Reach [[Home]].

## Step-by-step from a fresh run
- Get to Depths II and defeat Mom.
- Pick up **Dad’s Note** to begin [[Ascent & Dad's Note]].
- Keep ascending until you arrive at [[Home]].
- Proceed to trigger the **Dogma** fight.

## After Dogma
- You are locked into the Beast route leading to [[The Beast]].

items.name: The Ultra Harbingers
items.instructions: From a fresh run: after Dogma, fight Ultra Famine/Pestilence/War/Death on the way to The Beast.

items.name: The Beast
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Major end boss reached via The Ascent.

## Requirements
- Obtain [[Dad's Note]] to trigger [[The Ascent]].

## Step-by-step
- Get Dad's Note.
- Climb via The Ascent.
- Reach the final sequence and defeat The Beast.

items.name: Ultra Famine (The Beast)
items.instructions: From a fresh run: on the Beast route (post-Dogma), defeat this Ultra Harbinger during the ascent fight sequence.

items.name: Ultra Pestilence (The Beast)
items.instructions: From a fresh run: on the Beast route (post-Dogma), defeat this Ultra Harbinger during the ascent fight sequence.

items.name: Ultra War (The Beast)
items.instructions: From a fresh run: on the Beast route (post-Dogma), defeat this Ultra Harbinger during the ascent fight sequence.

items.name: Ultra Death (The Beast)
items.instructions: From a fresh run: on the Beast route (post-Dogma), defeat this Ultra Harbinger during the ascent fight sequence.

items.name: Downpour/Dross
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Alternate Chapter 1.5 path.

## How to enter
- Beat the Chapter 1 boss.
- A door appears that leads to [[Downpour/Dross]] instead of the normal next floor.

## Why you care
- Needed for the [[Mother]] route (Knife Piece 1).

items.name: Mines/Ashpit
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Alternate Chapter 2.5 path.

## How to enter
- After [[Downpour/Dross]], take the alt-path door at the end of the chapter.

## Why you care
- Needed for the [[Mother]] route (Knife Piece 2).

items.name: Mausoleum/Gehenna
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Alternate Chapter 3.5 path.

## How to enter
- After [[Mines/Ashpit]], use the knife to pass the special door into Mausoleum.

## Why you care
- Required to reach [[Corpse]].

items.name: Knife Piece 1
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Knife handle. Required for [[Assembled Knife]] and [[Mother]].

## Where it is
- Mirror World Treasure Room on Downpour/Dross 2.

## Step-by-step
- Get to Downpour/Dross 2.
- Enter [[Mirror World]].
- Go to Treasure Room.
- Pick up Knife Piece 1.

items.name: Knife Piece 2
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Knife blade. Required for [[Assembled Knife]] and [[Mother]].

## Where it is
- Mines/Ashpit 2 during a special chase sequence.

## Step-by-step
- Reach Mines/Ashpit 2.
- Find the trigger for the chase (puzzle/button/track room).
- Survive the chase to the end area.
- Pick up Knife Piece 2.

items.name: Corpse
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Final floor of the Mother route.

## How to access
- Mausoleum/Gehenna 2: open the flesh door with [[Assembled Knife]].

## Step-by-step
- Enter Corpse.
- Clear to the boss and defeat [[Mother]].

items.name: Ascent & Dad's Note
items.instructions:
## How to start
- Reach Depths II.
- Defeat Mom.
- Pick up **Dad's Note**.

## What happens
- The run reverses and you ascend back up through earlier floors.

## End goal
- Reach [[Home]] for [[Dogma]] and [[The Beast]].

items.name: Home
items.instructions:
## How to reach
- Start [[Ascent & Dad's Note]].
- Keep climbing until you reach **Home**.

## What to do at Home
- Open Mom’s bedroom.
- (Optional) Open the closet as a character to unlock its tainted version.

## End goal
- Trigger [[Dogma]] and the Beast route.

items.name: Downpour
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Alternate floor 1 for the “Mother” route (Repentance alt path).

## How to access
- Basement 1: find the alternate door (usually near the boss room).
- It costs **1 key** to open.

## Step-by-step
- Explore Basement 1 until you find the alt door.
- Open it with a key and enter Downpour/Dross.
- Downpour is required for [[Mother]] and for getting [[Knife Piece 1]].

## Tips
- Keep at least 1 key early if you're committing to the alt path.

items.name: Mines
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Alternate floor 2 for the “Mother” route.

## How to access
- Caves 1: find the alt door (costs **2 keys**) to enter Mines/Ashpit.

## Why it matters
- Mines/Ashpit 2 contains the sequence to obtain [[Knife Piece 2]].

items.name: Mausoleum
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Late alt-path floor.

## How to access
- Depths 1: take the alt door (costs **2 hearts**) to enter Mausoleum/Gehenna.

## Why you care
- Mausoleum/Gehenna 2 contains the flesh door opened by [[Assembled Knife]].

items.name: Mirror World
items.instructions:
## What it is
- A mirrored version of the floor used to obtain [[Knife Piece 1]].

## How to enter
- Downpour/Dross 2: find the **white fireplace** and extinguish it.
- Touch the mirror to enter Mirror World.

## Step-by-step
- Bring a bomb.
- Find the white fireplace room.
- Extinguish it (bomb or strong tears).
- Touch the mirror.
- Reach the Treasure Room and take [[Knife Piece 1]].

items.name: Assembled Knife
items.instructions:
## What it is
- The full knife made from [[Knife Piece 1]] + [[Knife Piece 2]].

## How it works
- The game assembles it automatically once you have both pieces.

## Why you care
- Used to open the flesh door on Mausoleum/Gehenna 2 to reach [[Corpse]].

items.name: Blue Door (Hush)
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Blue door that appears after Mom's Heart/It Lives if you are fast enough.

## Step-by-step
- Beat Mom's Heart/It Lives within the time limit.
- Enter the blue door to reach Blue Womb and [[Hush]].

items.name: Key Pieces (Mega Satan)
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Two key pieces that open Mega Satan's door.

## How to get them
- Enter [[Angel Rooms]].
- Bomb the angel statue.
- Defeat the angel boss for a key piece.
- Repeat for the second piece.

items.name: Dad's Note
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Story item that triggers [[The Ascent]].

## Step-by-step
- Pick it up on its floor.
- The game starts The Ascent immediately.

items.name: The Ascent
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Reverse climb after picking up [[Dad's Note]].

## Step-by-step
- Move upward through floors.
- Expect harder rooms and encounters.
- Reach the finale and fight [[The Beast]].
